block_comment: This block of code defines the bit depth for an I2S interface, using a parameter `I2S_BITS`. The bit depth depends on the defined flags `MAKE_HIFI` and `MAKE_DSP`. If the `MAKE_HIFI` flag is defined, `I2S_BITS` is set to 32. If the `MAKE_DSP` flag is defined, `I2S_BITS` is set to 64. This selective parameter definition allows for configuring the communication properties of the system during compile-time.
